lead_paragraph: EINHORN--Valery B.,of Rhinebeck, New York passed away on June 23, 2016. Born on March 19, 1954, in New York, NY, she was an architect and among her positions served as Borough Commissioner of The New York City Department of Buildings and as Architect in charge of Station Design for the Metropolitan Transportation Association of New York City. She is survived by her mother, Catherine Goldberg, her beloved husband Harold (Hal), her children Micole Taggart, Yiannes and Zoe Einhorn and her grandchildren, Zea Taggert and Nina and Olivia Einhorn. Memorial contributions may be made to the Church of St. John's the Evangelist, Barrytown, New York and the Poughkeepsie Day School, Poughkeepsie, New York. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EINHORN, VALERY B.
